really/truly/indeed/real/true/genuine

surname Dao
really/truly/indeed/real/true/genuine

sentences.english: No country hopes to see the United States and China fight with real swords and guns.
sentences.chinese: 所有国家都不希望看到美国和中国真刀真枪对抗。

sentences.english: This is Whitman's for-real next big gig.
sentences.chinese: 惠特曼这次可是要真刀真枪地再大干一场。
